mapper.insert: insert into READER_MESSAGE (id, creator, create_date, deleted, url, amount, count, status, category_type, categoryId, title, release_date, pageview, comment_count, digest, content) values (#{id}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{deleted}, #{url}, #{amount}, #{count}, #{status}, #{categoryType}, #{categoryId}, #{title}, #{releaseDate}, #{pageview}, #{commentCount}, #{digest}, #{content})
mapper.select: select * from READER_MESSAGE where deleted = '0' and url = #{url}
select * from READER_MESSAGE where deleted = '0' and channel_type = #{channelType} and channel_id = #{channelId} order by url desc;
mapper.update: update READER_MESSAGE set last_modifier = #{lastModifier}, last_modify_date = #{lastModifyDate}, deleted = #{deleted}, serial_number = #{serialNumber}, count = #{count}, status = #{status}, content = #{content} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from READER_MESSAGE where deleted = '0' and status = #{status} order by create_date asc limit 1
select * from READER_MESSAGE where deleted = '0' and serial_number = #{serialNumber} order by create_date asc limit 1
